QuestData.Title: Feeding Time
QuestData.Description: <The serpent darts forward and bites your fingers.>$B$BOuch! It seems, without a doubt, that the little beast is hungry. You recall that some meaty-looking turtles can be found on the wild cloud serpent island to the northeast.$B$BPerhaps some turtle meat will fill the hatchling's voracious appetite.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect 3 Saltback Meat and feed them to your hatchling companion.
